hooks.command: bash -c 'echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qiwE "(INSERT|UPDATE|DELETE|DROP|TRUNCATE|ALTER)" && echo "DENY: Direct SQL writes not allowed. Use repositories." && exit 1 || exit 0'
bash -c 'echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE "git\s+(merge|push.*(--force|-f))" && echo "DENY: git merge and force-push not allowed. Use PRs." && exit 1 || exit 0'
bash -c 'echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qiE "(echo|printf|cat).*(PASSWORD|SECRET|API_KEY|TOKEN|CREDENTIAL)" && echo "DENY: Echoing credentials not allowed." && exit 1 || exit 0'

bash -c 'echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE "git\s+(add|commit).*(application.*\.properties|application.*\.yml|\.env)" && echo "DENY: Committing config files with secrets not allowed." && exit 1 || exit 0'
bash -c 'echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE "rm\s+-[rf]*\s+(/|~|/home|/etc|/var)" && echo "DENY: Dangerous rm on system directories." && exit 1 || exit 0'
